title: 2 Bedroom + Office 1 Bath w/ Laundry in Unit
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 284396925', 'Rent: $3,100 / Month', 'Beds: 2.5', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Pet: Negotiable', 'This newly renovated 2nd floor unit boast beautiful hardwood floors throughout the entire space.', 'Open concept living space that flows into the kitchen, with updated stainless steel appliances, as well as an enclosed porch.', 'Two great sized bedrooms with ample lighting and large closets.', 'One additional room that can be used as an office space or additional bedroom.', 'Right in the heart of East Boston.', 'Find it easy to walk to local eateries, parks and shops.', ' Airport T Station.', 'Easy access to the Airport Blue Line T station as well as the East Boston greenway only .3 Miles away.', 'Off Street Parking available for $100 extra.', 'FEATURES', 'Central Air', 'Dishwasher', 'Hardwood Floors', 'Laundry in Unit', 'Microwave', 'Refrigerator']
